channel.title: Log in/Log out glitch
channel.description: Hello everytime I try to log out, it take a couple seconds to log out. Then when I try to log back in after that it either says "Error Connecting to Server" or "Your account is already logged in. Try again in 60 seconds...". But if I reload the client it logs on again. Can someone please tell me how to fix this glitch? Team viewer would be awesome if you can.

item.title: Log in/Log out glitch
item.dc:creator: @Marine5287 Marine5287
item.description:
@Marine5287 wrote:

Hello everytime I try to log out, it take a couple seconds to log out. Then when I try to log back in after that it either says “Error Connecting to Server” or “Your account is already logged in. Try again in 60 seconds…”. But if I reload the client it logs on again. Can someone please tell me how to fix this glitch? Team viewer would be awesome if you can.
